snippet.textDisplay: I don't know how much do u know about this case but there are voice recordings of the argument/fights between them. In this recording Amber Heard admits to attacking Johnny Depp verbally and physically, admit to not promise to stop attacking him. She talks about how she has hit him with cooking wear (Pans), battles n other objects. Call Johnny Depp a coward because he leaves every time they fight n never solve the issues.  U can head her cream at him why he always runs away n then in others she tells him that going to other room or the other side of the house is not enough space of distance, that when they are in hotels n he takes other room for himself is not far enough n that makes her harder for her to deal with it. Depp calmly answers her back saying that he loves her n that every time he leaves is because the arguments/fights get physical but she can't promise him not to get physical on their arguments in order to deal with it. There is also an incident where she attacks him with a broken bottle n nearly cut one of his finger off n Depp had to surgically attack it back. J. Depp did admit to verbally abuse her back in fight n to substance abuse issues (alcohol) that was well documented while he was filming Pirates of the Caribbean 5, but that he never hit her back. This I don't know much about but apparently there is evidence of her showing up with bruises and evidence of the attack and the day later pictures of her perfectly fine without any trace of physical abuse but this I have only heard seen some pictures but not pruff of when were taken on the videos I saw. Her best friends that were set to testify refused to do so n are not on speaking terms with her and allegation of her previous relationship came out that she also physically abuse them too. That's why a lot of the people are on Depp side, at the start everyone thought he was responsible since he had drinking issues (he did get help n turn it around, fixing his life n carrier that when he made the Murder on the Orient Express), but ones this recording came out that was recorded by Anber Heard not less the public opinion flip because very clearly she admits been the abuser, n many more. PS: this will have more reactions in the media, so I believe u may do other videos about it. check some of the info and legal case J. Depp is on n it will help u a lot on ur next video.

snippet.textDisplay: It’s Hollywood hypocrisy at it’s finest for sure.....However, it goes beyond that; Johnny was very much a victim of DV in their relationship. The evidence is so telling; however the judge has connections to Amber so Johnny didn’t stand a chance of winning. Is Johnny imperfect? YES Absolutely—no argument there! But it is so clear from the evidence in the trial that he was the victim in that relationship. If people care about rights of men, they’ll look deeper at the evidence in the case. Please check out Incredibly Average YouTube channel.

snippet.textDisplay: Because of the ruling, Warner Bros. won’t fire Amber Herd; going forward, according to officials court documents, she is now a survivor of domestic abuse. Firing Amber would be PR nightmare because it could be viewed as punishing the abused because if the actions of the abuser. This court case has nothing to do with clearing her name, Johnny Depp was trying to clear his name; that’s why it’s one sides. This specific court case was about Johnny.
snippet.textOriginal: Because of the ruling, Warner Bros. won’t fire Amber Herd; going forward, according to officials court documents, she is now a survivor of domestic abuse. Firing Amber would be PR nightmare because it could be viewed as punishing the abused because if the actions of the abuser. This court case has nothing to do with clearing her name, Johnny Depp was trying to clear his name; that’s why it’s one sides. This specific court case was about Johnny.

snippet.textDisplay: Information has come about that the judge, his wife and her lawyers are all connected. JD proved all her and the Sun's allegations were false, she constantly changed her statements, she embellished other allegations and they showed video and audio proof that Amber turd was the abuser, including independent witnesses, police reports. Yet with all the evidence in Johnny's corner the judge sided with Amber without any proof of her allegations...the umbrella guy, ehacker, nerdettes newsstand, spiritually empowered have comprehensive playlists going over every single court document and witness statements as well as Turdburgers statements that don't add up at all. Sorry I rambled, but this is total bullshit that a victim is being dismissed like this because he is a man....disgusting

snippet.textDisplay: I think he did the right thing by resigning from Fantastic Beasts. He is appealing the decision in the UK. If he wins his appeal, which he should, he could return to WB as he has left on good terms.
snippet.textOriginal: I think he did the right thing by resigning from Fantastic Beasts. He is appealing the decision in the UK. If he wins his appeal, which he should, he could return to WB as he has left on good terms.
